entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Extract Base Class" does not extract generic type parameters, causing errors in the extracted class #55871
    Bug, Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Large memory usage when serializing results of `GetUnusedReferenceAsync` #55869
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DebuggerTypeProxy get wrong struct data #55858
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, untriaged, Backlog
  • VS2019 debugger unable to select correct .NET Core Assembly when debugging with multiple AssemblyLoadContext(s). #55857
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, untriaged, Backlog
  • DebuggerDisplay fails to understand values from default interface implementation #55856
    Interactive-Debugging, Area-Interactive, untriaged, Backlog
  • Remove LangVersion=preview restriction from incremental source generators #55848
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Incorrect naming rule violation IDE1006 for ALL_UPPER starting with S as starting character #55845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Source Link support in Go To Definition #55834
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.1
  • IManagedHotReloadLanguageService.GetUpdatesAsync should return a syntax error in diagnostics. #55833
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, 17.0.P4

Closed

  • Intellisense isn't selecting the starred item by default #55546
    Area-IDE, Resolution-Fixed, IDE-IntelliSense, IntelliSense-Completion, 17.0
  • [API Proposal]: In-object fixed size arrays in safe context #55772
    Resolution-Duplicate, Area-Language Design, 17.1
  • CS8629: Nullable value type may be null' reported when it can not be null. #55862
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design
  • EnC: remove empty capability fallback #54386
    Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • EnC: validate mixed declarations and variables in deconstruction #50901
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • Request: Small Roslyn changes to aid runtimes without UTF-16 strings #55798
    Area-Language Design, untriaged
  • Garbage base clause causes compiler crash #55797
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed, 17.0.P4
  • Language services crashed when editing .NET Runtime project #55794
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed, 17.0.P4
  • Switch with falltrough cases and assignment of a variable #55754
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design
  • No way to properly distribute types in larger applications #55629
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • EnC: F5 applies change made during debugging session while the app is running #49004
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0.P4
  • IDE0005 is not reported if a code have same name extension methods. #54283
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, 17.0
  • A syntax error is missing for a misplaced ColonColon token in explicit interface implementation. #53021
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Unity 2017 / .NET 3.5 records support #55812
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design
  • Warning S3900 from Sonar is not showing up #55846
    Resolution-External, untriaged
  • Extract base class lightbulb menu option when cursor is on a class or a member is highlighted to create a new base class #46875
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog

Updated

  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • Test plan for Global Using Directive feature #51307
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective, 17.0
  • [Feature Request] Allow script globals object type to be passed via .rsp file #23421
    Feature Request, Area-Interactive, Backlog
  • Avoid unnecessary write in null-coalescing operator #20074
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Code Gen Quality, Compiler.Next
  • CodeLens reference count is not shown for const fields #32320
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • ExpressionCompiler is unable to emit a correct code in case of captured pattern matched variable #55883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true produces nondeterministic source paths by default #55860
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info
  • Safe Delete Refactoring #55588
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • EnC - More attribute edit tests #54430
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • `Default` should be allowed on `Private Protected` properties #55880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Criteria for "Add Usings On Paste" to be enabled by default #49444
    Area-IDE, Story, 17.0
  • Roslyn Compiler Service is forcing unneeded GCs, wasting CPU time #55807
    Bug, Area-Compilers
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    Bug, Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, 17.0
  • Unused type parameters in local functions could be elided #55800
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Local Functions, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Renaming of lambda parameter with 1 ref takes about 30 seconds #55400
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Should Roslyn or SDK provide a mechanism to enable/disable some/all source generators? #55518
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Enhance the Remove Unused References feature #50054
    Area-IDE, Story, IDE-CodeStyle, Dev17 IDE Priority, Backlog
  • Timeout on Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.CSharp.UnitTests.dll tests #55638
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged, Infraswat
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged, Infraswat
  • Compiler error message with unresolved parameter placeholders in VS2019 16.11: "ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1}" #55863
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Missing warning for non-exhaustive switch-expression #52714
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • EnC: Multi-process Cltr+F5 and attach #55761
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, Test-Scenario, untriaged, 17.0.P4
  • need some more documentation about source generators #55753
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Re-enable test CommandLineTests.ReservedDeviceNameAsFileName #55730
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, 17.0
  • Build fails with CS0263 when a partial class derived from a generic type is defined across different nullable contexts #45960
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • [Test Plan] Interpolated String Improvements #51499
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Dev17 IDE Priority, 17.0
  • Exhaustiveness check quacked on nested deconstruction #55719
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Roslyn fails to verify nullable attributes on lambda expressions in delegate conversions #55649
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Roslyn fails to corrently infer nullable annotations for implicitly typed variables in deconstruction #55647
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Compiler.Next
  • Improve CS0106 for the different cases where it can happen #55634
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info
  • Proposal: Avoid closures that capture a single reference-type variable per function #55758
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info
  • the compilerOptions of /optionexplicit- not work #55803
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info, untriaged
  • Tool to help locating C# global code causing CS7022 for the real Main() #54950
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged
  • Incremental Source Generators need a way to short-circuit unnecessary work #55579
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Detect SourceGenerator slowness and notify users to disable #55580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • IVT error CS0122 could be more detailed #55600
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Concept-Diagnostic Clarity, Backlog
  • `DocumentationCommentId.CreateReferenceId` doesn't handle generics properly #55572
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • The 17th parameter of a synthesized delegate doesn't have ref information encoded #55570
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Warning "CS1701: Assuming assembly reference 'mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' used by 'xxx' matches identity 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' of 'mscorlib', you may need to supply runtime policy" is not generated anymore #55690
    Bug, Area-Compilers
  • SyntaxNodeAction is invoked twice for the same syntax node in case of positional records #53136
    Area-Analyzers, Concept-API, Need More Info, Retriage, fabric-bot-test, 17.0
  • Non spec-conformant eval order for System.Index Expression #54085
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, 17.0
  • Add "Initialize Interactive with Project" support for projects other than .NET Framework #26934
    Feature Request, Area-Interactive, Backlog
  • Intellisense Return Value Documentation #31618
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Developer Community, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • IDE0004 false positive for overload by parameter type #55621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Improving the experience #49001
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC, Story, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Epic, Dev17 IDE Priority, Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers
  • Use Auto Prop analyzer bails out for all attributes #55872
    Area-IDE
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • Remove langver == preview restriction for incremental generators #55866
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0.P4
  • Restore intent of some top-level statement tests #55865
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Check CS0103 when try to replace type cast by 'is' pattern #55864
    Area-IDE
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • 🐇 Convert FileChangeWatcher to batch processing #55855
    Area-IDE
  • Remove attribute-dependent typeof warning #55854
    Area-Compilers
  • Ignore stale active statements. #55850
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55868
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove CallerArgumentExpression feature flag #55841
    Area-Compilers, Feature - CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute, Next
  • Update Build_Linux job to run on CoreEng build pool #55744
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55867
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify some code around top-level statements in SourceMemberContainerTypeSymbol #55851
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Restore vs deps #55853
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add a preview option for ServiceHub Core host #55736
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove capabilities fallback #55849
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • EnC - Test mixed declaration in deconstruction #55804
    Area-IDE, Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Directly reference theme keys #55827
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Dealing with more than one parameterless constructor #55824
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update status for generic attributes #55835
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55852
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55838
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report an error for a misplaced `::` token. #55828
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55842
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • 🐇 Ensure recoverable syntax trees are pushed to temporary storage #55399
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change preview pane to hide unusable options #55775
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main into release/dev17.1-preview1 #55830
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Create a test help for writing simpler metadata tests #54891
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55805
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55785
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Remove synchronous blocking call of go-to-def. #55885
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce array allocations when constructing options #55884
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55687
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disabled diff margin in cocoa quickfix preview. #55882
    Area-IDE
  • Add more attribute tests for more things #55881
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • EnC - Report diagnostic when compiler synthesizes new types on unsupported runtime #55876
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • Move the bulk of the work for rename after apply to be off the UI thread #55878
    Area-IDE
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Clear dependency information from unused references after analysis #55875
    Area-IDE
  • Fix compile errors in test method code. #55613
    Area-Compilers
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Set analyzers `global_level` to `-99`. #55472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #55628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add an option to let user could change the position of Inheritance Margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Move Static Members: Refactor moved member references #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
  • workspace.TryApplyChanges should respect changes to DefaultNamespace, and other project information #46021
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • BoundCompoundAssignmentOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54472
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
